question: What is the theme of the World Day for Audio-visual Heritage?
option4: The third Eye of every man
explanation:
The World Day for Audio-visual Heritage is celebrated on 27 October every year, across the world. This year, the theme is ‘Your Window to the World’.
The 33rd session of UNESCO’s General Conference proclaimed 27 October as World Day for Audio-visual Heritage, in commemoration of the adoption of the Recommendation for the Safeguarding and Preservation of Moving Images in 1980.
